"In 1962, Nkrumah survived an assassination attempt when a bomb was planted in his car. The bomb was discovered and defused before it could detonate."

"In 1964, Nkrumah survived another assassination attempt when a grenade was thrown at his car. The grenade failed to detonate, and Nkrumah was unharmed."
